about_the_game: 11-11 Memories Retold WarChild Charity DLC tells the story of Jack and Eva, two children drawn into World War I – a conflict much bigger than they are. Their stories are told in the form of letters, drawings and photographs found throughout the game and collected in your journal. The children's letters are inspired by real stories of conflicts by children supported by the WarChild charity. Whatever the war, their suffering remains the same.
detailed_description: 11-11 Memories Retold WarChild Charity DLC tells the story of Jack and Eva, two children drawn into World War I – a conflict much bigger than they are. Their stories are told in the form of letters, drawings and photographs found throughout the game and collected in your journal. The children's letters are inspired by real stories of conflicts by children supported by the WarChild charity. Whatever the war, their suffering remains the same.
legal_notice: Memories Retold™ & ©2018 BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Europe.
name: 11-11 Memories Retold War Child Charity DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10 
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940 
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870 
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10 
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz 
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480, Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Learn about the story of Jack and Eva, two children drawn into World War I – a conflict much bigger than they are by collecting their letters, drawings and photographs throughout the game.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
